example.name: passive
example.text: Although the proposal , co-authored [*] by Mr. Packwood and Sen. William Roth ( R. , Del. ) , appears [*-1] to have general backing by Republicans , their votes are n't sufficient [*] to pass it .
example.arg: Mr. Packwood and Sen. William Roth ( R. , Del. )
